summary: This is a forwarded email from May 26, 2020, between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel, coordinating the involvement of an individual named Hagan in a threats investigation and requesting connection with an agent and defense counsel, with mention of providing background on Mark Epstein.

persons.name: Donaleski Rebekah
persons.context: Recipient of the forwarded email, appears to be a prosecutor in the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Lonergan, Jessica
persons.context: Recipient of the forwarded email, appears to be a prosecutor in the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Scotten, Ha
persons.context: Copied on the forwarded email, appears to be a prosecutor in the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (full name likely Ha Scotten).

persons.name: Roos, Nicolas
persons.context: Copied on the forwarded email, appears to be a prosecutor in the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Hagan
persons.context: Described as 'on board for the threats investigation'; the email requests connecting him with an agent and defense counsel.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as someone for whom background information should be provided in the context of the threats investigation.

connections.description: Both are recipients of the same email from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating they work together.
Both are copied on the same email from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating they work together.
Hagan is involved in a threats investigation, and background on Mark Epstein is to be provided to him, suggesting an investigative link.

events.title: Coordination for threats investigation
events.description: An email is sent coordinating the involvement of Hagan in a threats investigation, requesting connection with an agent and defense counsel, and provision of background on Mark Epstein.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was coordinating a 'threats investigation' in May 2020.
An individual named Hagan was brought on board for this threats investigation.
The investigation involved providing background information on Mark Epstein, the brother of Jeffrey Epstein.
The email shows coordination between prosecutors (Donaleski, Lonergan, Scotten, Roos) to connect Hagan with an agent and defense counsel.
